statements: SELECT * FROM target_species_population_genetics;
SELECT species_name, genetic_variation FROM target_species_population_genetics WHERE species_id = 1;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM target_species_population_genetics WHERE genetic_variation > 3.00;
SELECT * FROM target_species_population_genetics WHERE population_size < 1000;
SELECT species_id, species_name, population_size, genetic_variation FROM target_species_population_genetics ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT * FROM target_species_population_genetics ORDER BY population_size DESC, species_name ASC;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM target_species_population_genetics WHERE genetic_variation > 4.0;
SELECT species_name, genetic_variation FROM target_species_population_genetics WHERE population_size BETWEEN 1000 AND 5000;
SELECT * FROM target_species_population_genetics WHERE species_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT species_id, species_name, population_size, genetic_variation FROM target_species_population_genetics ORDER BY genetic_variation DESC, species_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM population_genetics;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM population_genetics WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM genetic_variants ORDER BY variant_frequency DESC;
SELECT variant_name, variant_type, variant_frequency FROM genetic_variants WHERE variant_type = 'SNP';
SELECT * FROM population_genetics WHERE allele_frequency BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.5;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM population_genetics;
SELECT species_name, allele_frequency FROM population_genetics WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT * FROM genetic_variants ORDER BY variant_frequency DESC;
SELECT species_name, allele_frequency FROM population_genetics WHERE allele_frequency BETWEEN 0.2 AND 0.8;
SELECT species_name, variant_name, variant_type FROM population_genetics, genetic_variants WHERE population_size > 5000 AND variant_frequency > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM population_genetics;
SELECT proj_name, species_type FROM population_genetics WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM genetic_data WHERE genotype = 'AA';
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM research_team ORDER BY team_size DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT species_type FROM population_genetics;
SELECT * FROM population_genetics WHERE population_size > 1000;
SELECT proj_id, species_type FROM population_genetics WHERE species_type = 'Mammal';
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_size FROM research_team ORDER BY team_size DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT p.proj_name, g.genotype, r.team_name FROM population_genetics p JOIN genetic_data g ON p.proj_id = g.proj_id JOIN research_team r ON p.proj_id = r.proj_id;

SELECT DISTINCT p.proj_name AS Project, g.genotype AS Genotype, r.team_name AS Team FROM population_genetics p JOIN genetic_data g ON p.proj_id = g.proj_id JOIN research_team r ON p.proj_id = r.proj_id ORDER BY Project ASC;
SELECT * FROM PopulationGenetics
SELECT species_name, population_size, creation_date FROM PopulationGenetics ORDER BY population_size DESC
SELECT founder_species_name, founder_population_location FROM FounderPopulation WHERE founder_population_size > 1000
SELECT mutation_type, mutation_effect, mutation_frequency FROM GeneticMutation LIMIT 3
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date, result_summary FROM ExperimentResults WHERE experiment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT * FROM PopulationGenetics;
SELECT species_name, population_size, creation_date FROM PopulationGenetics ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT id, founder_species_name, founder_population_size FROM FounderPopulation WHERE founder_population_location = 'Europe';
SELECT * FROM GeneticMutation WHERE mutation_frequency BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.5;
SELECT experiment_name, experiment_date, result_summary FROM ExperimentResults WHERE population_id = 1 ORDER BY experiment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Species;
SELECT species_name, population_size FROM Species WHERE population_size > 1000 ORDER BY population_size DESC;
SELECT individual_id, gender, color FROM Individuals WHERE gender = 'male';
SELECT id, genotype FROM Genotypes WHERE mutation_rate < 0.1;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM Projects WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Species WHERE population_size > 100 ORDER BY average_lifespan DESC;
SELECT Individuals.individual_id, Individuals.gender, Species.species_name FROM Individuals JOIN Species ON Individuals.species_id = Species.id WHERE Individuals.gender = 'Male';
SELECT Genotypes.genotype, Phenotypes.phenotype FROM Genotypes JOIN Phenotypes ON Genotypes.individual_id = Phenotypes.individual_id WHERE Genotypes.mutation_rate > 0.1;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_projects FROM Projects WHERE end_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT AVG(average_lifespan) AS avg_lifespan, MAX(population_size) AS max_population FROM Species;
